text: Akalgarh is a village located in Ludhiana district of Punjab in India.http://www.citypopulation.de/php/india-punjab.php?cityid=0340904000 This town is inhabited mainly by people having all types mix. The latest sarpanch is satinderjit 'TINDI'. ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana district
title: Akalgarh, Ludhiana
